credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 22 x 18 cm (8 11/16 x 7 1/16 in.)
title: Sample
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: plain weave with paired warps and 1&3 interlacing
description: Sample with a warp of yellow two-ply yarn. Weft has a variety of yarns including: red two-ply yarn, yellow rickrack woven braid, crinkled paper ribbon, yellow chenille, yellow boucle and red imitation leather. Most wefts pass through doubled warps. The rickrack and some of the chenille passes over three warps and under one.
name: Sample
